resources.string: Fantasy Defense
Tip _ :
Equip the item on your Hero under the [Item] > [Equipment] menu.
Clear stages and acquire up to 3 Heroes.
Certain stages reward you with a Hero character.
Use Mana to increase the levels of your Heroes.
Heroes consume Mana to use their special skills.
Special skills have a downtime after each use.
Clear a stage to receive Hero Points.
Configure your game settings under the [Title Screen] > Settings.
Basic units can be upgraded up to Level 3.
Hero units can be upgraded up to Level 5.
Upgrade your units to give them stronger abilities.
Use gold to advance your units to higher classes or increase their levels.
Increase the level of your units to improve their combat capabilities.
Advance your units to higher classes for more versatile abilities.
Reselling a unit returns to you a portion _ of the money that you spent to hire the unit.
You will fail a Boss stage if you fail to defeat the bosses.
Boss monsters have high HP, but they move slowly.
Monsters drop gold and mana upon death.
Use Hero Points to buy items under [Item] > [Shop].
Use Hero Points to upgrade your Hero and basic units under the [Skill] menu.
Knights, the 2nd advanced class of Warrior,_have high Attack Speed.
Warlords, the 3rd advanced class of Warrior,_inflict Splashed damage to multiple enemies.
Special Warrior Brandishers attack monsters with a chance of causing Stun.
Splatters, the 2nd advanced class of Archer,_shoot multi arrows and attack up to 3 enemies at the same time.
Sky Arrows, the 3rd advanced class of Archer,_strike enemies with their extremely Long Attack Range.
Special Archer Holy Eyes specialize in DoT (Damage over Time) attacks.
Sorceresses, the 2nd advanced class of Wizard, inflict Piercing damage.
Blasters, the 3rd advanced class of Wizard,_inflict Splashed damage with their Fire magic.
Special Wizard Ice Mages attack monsters with a chance of causing Slow.
Clear all the normal stages to unlock two special modes: _ Destroy the Moon and Infinite.
A stage\'s Infinite Mode is only opened_when you clear it with a perfect score.
The objective of Destroy the Moon is to destroy_the monster gates where monsters spawn.
Destroy stage objects to obtain gold and mana.
When clearing a normal stage more than twice,_you will receive only 70% of the Hero Point reward from the stage.
Touch a monster or object to manually attack it.
Blasters, the 3rd advanced class of Wizard,_inflict Splashed damage with their Fire magic.
Special Wizard Ice Mages attack monsters with a chance of causing Slow.
You will receive a Hero unit or additional ability_each time you clear 5 stages.
Clear Stage 25 to upgrade your units up to 10 levels.
Clear Stage 5 to unlock the special skill of your Hero units.
Clear Stage 30 to unlock the special attack ability_of your Hero units. (Splashed damage or Double Shot)
Never hesitate to upgrade your Heroes and basic units_when facing a difficult stage.
Certain stages contain special items for you to discover.
Cash items endow special abilities.
Humans and monsters used to coexist _ on the Crasto Continent,
and its history was determined by
its founding heroes who fought
against the Wraith King _ who wished to annihilate the Humans.
Thousands of years ago,
the Humans started a war _ against the monsters
that were born to prey upon men.
For hundreds of years,
thousands of Humans died
until heroes rose up to seal the Wraith King,_ the father of all monsters.
He was sealed at the end of the world
and his children were weakened.
While the Humans enjoyed their victory,
the surviving monsters fled to the _ end of the continent.
And thenâ€¦
It was a new era of peace.
The signs of war\'s ravage slowly vanished.
The soil was rich
and the forests grew far and wide.
The Humans forgot
one important truth:
the evil king might be sealed,
but he wasn\'t destroyed.
One day, a volcano erupted without warning
and spewed flaming red lava for a week.
The sun didn\'t rise.
The moon and stars hid themselves.
It was a week when
the sky was always pitch-dark.
No light could be seen, day or night.
One night, an evil moon appeared.
It was an omen declaring the evil king\'s coming.
On the seventh night of the evil moon,
the seal of the evil king completely lost its power,
allowing the king resurrect
at the end of the world.
Wraith King is now on the loose, stronger than ever, _ and ready to strike back.
\'Fantasy Defence\' Version 2.0.1
